pageProps.toc: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#resource-configuration","depth":2,"text":"资源配置方式 "},{"url":"#string-format","depth":3,"text":"字符串形式 "},{"url":"#object-format","depth":3,"text":"对象形式 "},{"url":"#built-in-protocols","depth":2,"text":"内置资源协议 "},{"url":"#svg-resource","depth":3,"text":"1. SVG 资源 "},{"url":"#remote-url","depth":3,"text":"2. 远程 URL "},{"url":"#base64-image","depth":3,"text":"3. Base64 图片 "},{"url":"#search-icon","depth":3,"text":"4. 图标搜索 "}]
pageProps.content:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic 提供了",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/icon","children":"图标服务"}],"，对于使用插图的模版，则需要自行处理加载逻辑。可选方案："]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"内置协议"}],"：使用 Data URI 直接嵌入资源（无需注册加载器）"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"自定义加载器"}],"：注册加载器从你的服务按需拉取"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"resource-configuration","children":"资源配置方式 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在数据中，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"icon"}]," 和 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"illus"}]," 属性可以配置资源："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon <ResourceConfig 或字符串>
      illus <ResourceConfig 或字符串>
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["更多加载策略（图标协议、失败兜底等）请参阅",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/custom-resource-loader","children":"自定义资源加载器"}],"。"]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"string-format","children":"字符串形式 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["字符串会被自动解析为 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#resource-config","children":"ResourceConfig"}]," 对象："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-typescript","children":"// 内联 SVG（非 base64）
icon: 'data:image/svg+xml,<svg>...</svg>';
// 标准 base64 图片（png/jpg/webp/...）
icon: 'data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA...';
// 远程资源（可选格式提示）
icon: 'ref:remote:svg:https://example.com/icon.svg';
illus: 'ref:remote:https://example.com/banner.png'; // 未提供 fmt 时会按 URL / Content-Type 推断
// 搜索图标（由 AntV 图标搜索服务提供）
icon: 'ref:search:svg:computer network';
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"object-format","children":"对象形式 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["可以直接提供 ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#resource-config","children":"ResourceConfig"}]," 对象："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-typescript","children":"interface ResourceConfig {
  source: 'inline' | 'remote' | 'search' | 'custom';
  format?: 'svg' | 'image' | string;     // 兜底格式提示，优先使用真实 Content-Type/内容判定
  encoding?: 'raw' | 'data-uri' | 'base64';
  data: string;                          // inline 内容 / URL / 搜索词 / 自定义 payload
  scene?: 'icon' | 'illus';              // 可选，框架会自动填充当前字段的场景
  [key: string]: any;                    // 自定义扩展
}
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"built-in-protocols","children":"内置资源协议 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"框架内置了几种资源协议，无需注册加载器即可使用："}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"svg-resource","children":"1. SVG 资源 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["使用 Data URI 格式的 SVG，以 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data:image/svg+xml,"}]," 开头，后面为 SVG 字符串："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon data:image/svg+xml,<svg>...</svg>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"remote-url","children":"2. 远程 URL "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["通过自定义协议 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ref:remote[:fmt]:<url>"}]," 直接指定 URL（",["$r","code",null,{"children":"fmt"}]," 可省略，缺省时由 URL 或响应头推断）："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon ref:remote:svg:https://example.com/icon.svg
"}]}],"
",["$r","Warning",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"远程资源加载可能受到 CORS 限制，请确保资源服务器配置了正确的跨域响应头。"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"base64-image","children":"3. Base64 图片 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["使用 Base64 编码的图片，遵循标准 data URI，如 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data:image/<format>;base64,"}],"："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAAAAUA...
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"search-icon","children":"4. 图标搜索 "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["通过 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ref:search[:fmt]:<keywords>"}]," 使用AntV 图标搜索服务提供资源，",["$r","code",null,{"children":"fmt"}]," 默认为 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"svg"}],"："]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon ref:search:computer network
"}]}]]}]]
pageProps.tocEn: [{"url":"#","text":"Overview","depth":2},{"url":"#resource-configuration","depth":2,"text":"Resource Configuration Methods "},{"url":"#string-format","depth":3,"text":"String Format "},{"url":"#object-format","depth":3,"text":"Object Format "},{"url":"#built-in-protocols","depth":2,"text":"Built-in Resource Protocols "},{"url":"#svg-resource","depth":3,"text":"1. SVG Resources "},{"url":"#remote-url","depth":3,"text":"2. Remote URL "}]
pageProps.contentEn:
[["$r","MaxWidth","last",{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":["AntV Infographic provides an ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/icon","children":"icon service"}],". For templates that use illustrations, you need to handle the loading logic yourself. Optional approaches:"]}],"
",["$r","ol",null,{"children":["
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Built-in Protocol"}],": Use Data URI to embed resources directly (no loader registration required)"]}],"
",["$r","li",null,{"children":[["$r","strong",null,{"children":"Custom Loader"}],": Register a loader to fetch on-demand from your service"]}],"
"]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"resource-configuration","children":"Resource Configuration Methods "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["In data, the ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"icon"}]," and ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"illus"}]," properties can configure resources:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon <ResourceConfig or string>
      illus <ResourceConfig or string>
"}]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["For more loading strategies (icon protocols, failure fallbacks, etc.), see ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/learn/custom-resource-loader","children":"Custom Resource Loader"}],"."]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"string-format","children":"String Format "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Strings are automatically parsed into ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#resource-config","children":"ResourceConfig"}]," objects:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-typescript","children":"// Inline SVG (not base64)
icon: 'data:image/svg+xml,<svg>...</svg>';
// Standard base64 image (png/jpg/webp/...)
icon: 'data:image/png;base64,iVBORw0KGgoAAAANSUhEUgAA...';
// Remote resource (optional format hint)
icon: 'ref:remote:svg:https://example.com/icon.svg';
illus: 'ref:remote:https://example.com/banner.png'; // When fmt is not provided, inferred from URL / Content-Type
// Search icon (provided by AntV icon search service)
icon: 'ref:search:svg:computer network';
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"object-format","children":"Object Format "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["You can directly provide a ",["$r","a",null,{"href":"/reference/infographic-types#resource-config","children":"ResourceConfig"}]," object:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-typescript","children":"interface ResourceConfig {
  source: 'inline' | 'remote' | 'search' | 'custom';
  format?: 'svg' | 'image' | string;     // Fallback format hint, prioritize actual Content-Type/content determination
  encoding?: 'raw' | 'data-uri' | 'base64';
  data: string;                          // inline content / URL / search term / custom payload
  scene?: 'icon' | 'illus';              // Optional, framework will automatically fill in the current field's scene
  [key: string]: any;                    // Custom extension
}
"}]}],"
",["$r","h2",null,{"id":"built-in-protocols","children":"Built-in Resource Protocols "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"The framework has several built-in resource protocols that can be used without registering a loader:"}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"svg-resource","children":"1. SVG Resources "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Use Data URI format SVG, starting with ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"data:image/svg+xml,"}],", followed by SVG string:"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon data:image/svg+xml,<svg>...</svg>
"}]}],"
",["$r","h3",null,{"id":"remote-url","children":"2. Remote URL "}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["Directly specify URL through custom protocol ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"ref:remote[:fmt]:<url>"}]," (",["$r","code",null,{"children":"fmt"}]," can be omitted, inferred from URL or response headers when missing):"]}],"
",["$r","pre",null,{"children":["$r","code",null,{"className":"language-syntax","children":"data
  items
    - icon ref:remote:svg:https://example.com/icon.svg
"}]}],"
",["$r","Warning",null,{"children":["$r","p",null,{"children":"Remote resource loading may be subject to CORS restrictions. Please ensure that the resource server is configured with proper cross-origin response headers."}]}]]}]]
